definition: to reveal/to publish/to make public/to announce
to drape over one's shoulders/to open/to unroll/to split open/to spread out
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose

sentences.english: The development of financial circles and strick precaution of the risk are closely linked with disclosure of financial information.
sentences.chinese: 金融业的发展及其风险的防范与信息披露息息相关。

sentences.english: An absence of the exposure of knowledge-based assets will cause a seriously underrated evaluation of enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 对知识资产披露的缺失使企业价值被严重低估。

sentences.english: The company shall disclose the situation of implementation of the cash dividends policy in the current reporting period.
sentences.chinese: 公司还应披露现金分红政策在本报告期的执行情况。

sentences.english: Several concessionaires were asked to disclose their revenues and declined.
sentences.chinese: 几个特许经营者被要求披露其收入和下降。

sentences.english: Terms of the deal were not disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 合并协议的条款没有披露。

sentences.english: All markets should have standards for stability and a mechanism for disclosure.
sentences.chinese: 所有市场都必须建立稳定性标准和信息披露机制。

sentences.english: Greater disclosure requirements to answer to private-sector shareholders is significant.
sentences.chinese: 更大的披露要求对与私有部门的持股者来说意义重大。

sentences.english: Listed companies are not generally required to issue paid announcements in gazetted newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 上市公司毋须在宪报指定报章刊登付款公布披露资料。

sentences.english: Guti said he was considering an offer from Turkish club Besiktas.
sentences.chinese: 古蒂披露，他正在考虑来自土耳其贝西克塔斯的邀请。

sentences.english: NEPA requires that plausible statements as to the prospective impacts be disclosed in advance.
sentences.chinese: 覃要求的陌瞻性声明为似是而非的关系是提前披露。

sentences.english: In addition, noncash investing and financing activities are reported in an accompanying schedule .
sentences.chinese: 另外，非现金投资和筹资活动被披露在附表中。

sentences.english: Durex sexual well being survey is an annual affair in which they reveal trends across the globe.
sentences.chinese: 杜蕾斯性福调查每年进行一次，披露的是全球趋势。

sentences.english: The Company has a legal obligation to disclose any of the people.
sentences.chinese: 本公司有法律义务对之披露的任何人士。

sentences.english: But the rollcall of Japanese names went on.
sentences.chinese: 但日文名单仍在继续被披露。

sentences.english: Holder did not reveal the identity of the detainees in his statement.
sentences.chinese: 霍尔德没有在他的声明中披露囚犯的身份。

sentences.english: The disclosure of relevant information is made by addi…
sentences.chinese: 相关信息披露主要是通过会计报表附注实现。

definition: China Securities Regulatory Commission (CSRC)/abbr. for 中國證券監督管理委員會|中国证券监督管理委员会[Zhong1 guo2 Zheng4 quan4 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
to quote/to cite/to recommend (one's friend's, associates etc)
to submit (a report etc)/to refer (a problem) to sb
